website_summaries.verdict: The Welch's snack is a good choice If you want strong fruity flavors that still offer a vitamin benefit.
pros: Adults enjoy them as much as kids
cons: Enough sugar in this snack to  make it more like a candy

customer_reviews.title: lacks quality control
customer_reviews.text: Got a few packs that tasted like straight chemicals, maybe half a dozen packs, but just tossed them because the rest seemed fine. Then I found a fully intact bug stuck to one of the fruit snacks, looks like it died in the bag. Nasty. I understand that things happen, but where is the quality control? I never review stuff like this but at least 7 out of an 80 count box were thrown out. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Gummy God Approvez
customer_reviews.text: You know when you open up the pack and they’re all yellow and orange like the fruit snack god is confirming that life hates you??? Yeah, every Welch’s Pack has been a life affirming majority of red and purple gummies like a pat on the back and “you can do it!” In a pouch. Just buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: tarajean

customer_reviews.title: Freshness issue
customer_reviews.text: Yes, a good price. But someone switched the box. The expiration date (or best by) on the individual packages is September 2017. The date on the box is April 2018. I bought a larger bag of these snacks while on travel and they were much fresher tasting and softer. I'll buy these at Costco for now on -- if there's a freshness issue it's much easier to return.
customer_reviews.author: MAG70

customer_reviews.title: I used to buy these from work every day. ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these from work every day. THIS DOES NOT TASTE THE SAME. At all. They’re either really old or expired or fake..
customer_reviews.author: mystrocs

customer_reviews.title: I can't get enough of these!!
customer_reviews.text: First off,I'm a 56yr.old, "chocoholic"!I'm into chocolate.Until,my 2 grandkids blessed me!I was sharing a pack of Welch's Fruit Snacks with my grandson.Suddenly I couldn't control myself!I was devouring pack after pack.I was hooked!I love that they are soft,unlike other break your teeth brands.Love the burst of flavor!Each month through Subscibe&Save I order 2 boxes of 40 each.This month I ran out!!I saw the 80 pack@an excellent price&placed my order. They arrived earlier than scheduled,flavor is perfect! I'm extremely happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bikegirl

customer_reviews.title: Fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fruit snacks for kids at any ages. Kids can eat at any time. We usually looking for some healthy snacks for picnic or out door activities and this is perfect for that. The small pack inside has strawberry, raspberry, orange and blueberry flavor which is very popular fruits among kids. Only the price is bit high in amazon, I felt.
customer_reviews.author: AKumar

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased these in the past from other stores and they were great. When received
customer_reviews.text: The fruit snacks were stale when they arrived. I have purchased these in the past from other stores and they were great. When received, the expiration date was 2 months away, but the fruit snacks were already very hard. I bought them to go with snacks for my child's basketball team. Everyone had a very hard time chewing them. It was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MelH

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing value! I have purchased these several times over the past 6 months and every time the snacks have been fresh! A lot of people have asked about the expiration date. The expiration dates on every box has been about 6-8 months out! So plenty of time to enjoy these. I personally have 3 kids and this box lasts about 2 1/2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mom23hs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be perfect for so many reasons. 1st I found these to be so helpful when I quit smoking and second my Grandson loves them. I found this 40 pack box and then later saw that they had other varieties as well. The Berries and Cherries are perfect also, we like to blend them and do so every month. Being able to have them sent at a specified date each month is wonderful. But you can have them shipped anytime you want them, just subscribe and save. I highly recommend these and the Berries and Cherries as well,
customer_reviews.author: Richard Boyer Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great size packets to add to lunches
customer_reviews.text: Love these fruit snacks and like getting the small packs so they stay fresh. Box is huge but the individual small packs are not crushed. The product I received was fresh and great to add to lunches.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Clark

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite Snack Over The Years
customer_reviews.text: I always send care packages to my son at college (thank goodness he is in his last year). Before he left for college this fall I asked him what did he want in his care package via Amazon. The first thing he said was fruit snacks. That is why I am writing this review. I gave these to my children when they were younger and apparently the love for them has stayed over the years. I am happy to send these fond memory snacks to my man-child while away at school.
customer_reviews.author: PATOLA

customer_reviews.title: Was Very Pleased With This Order"
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the delivery of this order... Not only was the delivery fast , it was delivered as asked to be ( Not Seen From The Street) ... Which is much appreciated by me... As for the product itself, it's a small snack for throughout the day that's juicy & portioned well... I would definitely recommend this product to Mom's that have children as a healthy mid day snack ...
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the daily deal. Great pick up. Not just for kids. Adults that are trying to kick the daily sugar intake this has helped me lately. Instead of a whole bowl of ice cream a little pack was a good substitute. Enjoy. Was packed well as often in the desert things can get hot when delivered at the wrong time.
customer_reviews.author: RLT22

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC TASTE WITHOUT THE MESS
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE REALLY GOOD, YOU CAN TASTE THE FRUIT IN THESES. I LIKE THE PACKAGING, AS A OVERWEIGHT ADULT ITS GREAT TO KNOW ACTUALLY WHAT YOUR GETTING AND HOW MANY CALORIES. KIDS SHOULD LOVE THEM. MY PARROT LOVE THEM, MY DOGS NOT SO MUCH.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Forester

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as subscribe and save Normally I love these things. But half of the packs are just bad. I don't have this problem when I get them from the store. These are not expired, but they taste it. They have a powdery coat, are hard, and taste funny. Some are okay and some are what I was expecting. I'm finding myself tossing at least half. This isn't saving me any money. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DziliziTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Not lovin’ it
customer_reviews.text: This product is technically correct with nothing wrong. That being said, they are dried out and kinda hard :( The best by date is 10/11/19. So, 190 days/ 27 weeks. I can only assume it must be where the boxes are stored at is the problem? I usually pick these up at the local Costco, and only mixed fruit goodness. Lol
customer_reviews.author: zora auton

customer_reviews.title: STOP THE MADNESS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be very discriminating for the progressive era we live in. There was rarely more than one grape flavored one per individual pack, I’m talking maybe like 4-5 bags with more than one grape. And grape is by far my favorite flavor which made things extra disappointing. Always too many red ones. Come on Welch’s, step your game up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You've been warned !!!
customer_reviews.text: if you haven't tried this you might reach for a smaller size first, but these seem more like candy than "fruit" or maybe it's my inability to put them aside. These are absolutely addicting and I'll have to limit them in my home as the extra calorie intake is easy to rationalize. I ate an entire box myself and don't even have the pangs of guilt I would otherwise have with chocolate. OK, I admit it. I have no willpower around these.
customer_reviews.author: Vince DellaSperanza

customer_reviews.title: Great fat-free treat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I have trouble keeping them in the house with the kids around. But they are not just for kids. Plus they have 100% of your daily vitamin C and some other vitamins too. Fat free snack that even is made with real fruit. I like the fact that they don't make a sticky mess either. This deal is much better than the local retailers. I reorder them quite frequently.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS PRUZINSKY

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, so brush brush to keep the cavities away :-)
customer_reviews.text: My daughter warned me not to buy too many of these, because she severely limits sticky snacks for her kids. The kids LOVE them :-) I told her I'd give them out to trick-or-treaters, but she's protective of other kids' teeth too :-D
customer_reviews.author: PatJ

customer_reviews.title: Stale and hard
customer_reviews.text: Although the box reflects an expiration day months away, the item was stale. I have bought these fruit snacks other places and they're usually soft. These were hard.
customer_reviews.author: Polka Dot

customer_reviews.title: 7/10 times 5 stars but the last 3 boxes have been hard and stale
customer_reviews.text: Really a shame because it's one of the things me and my husband look forward to in monthly subscribe and save. Great value. Cheaper than walmart. However, the last 3 shipments have had more than 1/2 or all the bags with hard gummies. Theses gummies should be soft and easy to chew. I gave it a few months but no improvements. cancelling subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and softer texture than most.
customer_reviews.text: One of the softest and freshest tasting fruit snacks on the market. I've tried many different brands. That's why I buy the big box. They are shaped like the fruit that represents each flavor. I even teach my kids with them. They're a great low mess and quick travel snack. Only drawback is I wish they were all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: taste OLD & hard
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these most of the time, THEN are the boxes that have only snacks that are very dark , very mushy & just plain taste old. I started checking exp dates & most of the time that worked out for the best until lately all I'm getting are bad no mater the expiration date. I just bought a box of 110 & every pack i.ve got out taste awful. I don't know if its amazon keeping them to long or welches fault. whoever is to blame money is to hard to come by only to have to throw the purchase in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please read
customer_reviews.text: Horrible never buy any and if u have any get my email and I'll dispose of them for u. If you purchase send them to me and I'll dispose of them properly. C'mon guys let's make this a movement. I will assure you I will consume every single one so the burden no longer falls on you. Im selfless that way
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: I love getting the big boxes in Amazon so they last ...
customer_reviews.text: I know these are mostly for kiddos, but my husband loves these. We go through them in our house quicker than most staples in a kitchen. I love getting the big boxes in Amazon so they last longer and we get a better price. My husband would give these 5 stars as often as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Friars

customer_reviews.title: Not Welches Quality
customer_reviews.text: All apple fruit and ? In the last 15 packages I found only 2 blackberry and NO grape. Welches with no grape? I fear these are a knockoff. They are mostly tasty fruit. Just not sure what fruit! Taste most like apple.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph D

customer_reviews.title: Good drunk mistake
customer_reviews.text: I had one too many one night and decided I needed a box of these fruit snacks. I wish I knew I ordered a box of 80... but hey, you can’t go wrong with some good fruit snacks! Probably better suited for a house full of kids but I will eat as many as I please and come out of this quarantine with an extra 5lbs of fruit snacks in my belly!
customer_reviews.author: NMS

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best fruit snacks. They are softer chewies and you can tell the flavor is better than the gummier ones with less fruit that feel "hard" by comparison. On the other hand - you aren't getting real fruit. They are basically like candy. But I still like them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I bought these after rediscovering my love of Fiber One's Fruit Snacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after rediscovering my love of Fiber One's Fruit Snacks, then finding out those were discontinued. The texture of these is not as appealing as the Fiber One gummies, but they are decent. I like having these as a mid-afternoon snack. The different shapes/colors do taste different, to my surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Kari D.

customer_reviews.title: Not kid friendly fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: This is how my box arrived. Fruit snacks ordered for my kids the label was put on the food box and it was shipped. In today’s world how is this safe from being tampered with?have no idea if it has been tampered with? The fact that some are missing isn’t even of importance it’s the safety issue that concerns me.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Liebeck

customer_reviews.title: Literal Perfection! A must-buy
customer_reviews.text: Literal Perfection! I’m a 21-year old college student and I couldn’t control myself from these bad boys! Finished all of them literally within two weeks. I didn’t even have time to count to see if the amount stated was met! But I’m definitely gonna be getting these a couple more times. If you wanna help a struggling college student with food and you’re I sure of what they like, these would definitely be appreciated
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Convenient snack size
customer_reviews.text: These are a slightly softer version of the standard gummy candy. The packs are small but the right size for very small children. As an adult you may want a couple of bags. I have purchased larger bulk packs in the past and the 40 pack size looks to be better suited to be able to consume before they start to age. I ave noticed a texture change as the age going from very soft when purchased / fresh to much more firm over time. No discernible flavor change over time but the texture variance is notable.
customer_reviews.author: G. VO

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture, though not a lot for the calories
customer_reviews.text: These are softer than most gummy bears, perhaps more comparable to fresh jujubes, but thanks to the packaging they stay soft for a long time. They are made from concentrated fruit juice, though they're still basically sugar. The packaging is convenient, though it does drive home how little you get for the calories. They're a cheap thrill, but like most sugary treats, they don't satisfy you. If you're hungry when you have a bag, you sill be hungry afterwards, and perhaps even hungrier after the insulin kicks in.
customer_reviews.author: ronparr

customer_reviews.title: Great amount for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a student in his class with a peanut allergy so all snacks brought to school need to have ingredients written on the packaging. After buying several different types of gummies, even though the box said they were peanut free the ingredients were not written on the individual packages so he was unable to bring them to school. I went on Amazon and after it was confirmed by other customers that the ingredients were listed where they were needed I bought them. Free shipping too so good deal and no extra cost. He loves them too so it was a win win!
customer_reviews.author: C. Choquette

customer_reviews.title: Best fruit snack on the market
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting fruit snack on the market! I love the texture... it isn’t soft and mushy... but more firm and gummy. The flavors are bold and full... almost like candy! Our whole family loves these. The box comes with smaller individual snack size packages in it. Perfect for grabbing and going.
customer_reviews.author: Sohala

customer_reviews.title: Welch's makes the best fruit snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Welch's fruit snacks are THE best fruit snacks. Don't bother buying Mott's or the Fruit Gushers snacks, they're mostly sugar and have a sticky gummy texture and off flavor. The only issue I had was with the grape flavor being slightly harder texture and the lemon flavor being slightly softer texture. Welch's (Facebook) said it has to do with the grape and lemon concentrates with one more naturally hardening and the other having a softer texture. The ones from Walmart are usually unnoticeable so it just means the grape ones need to be eaten long before the end of their shelf life. Still, I can't recommend them highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeK

customer_reviews.title: unpleasant and unfun
customer_reviews.text: I cannot remember the last time I had a gummy that was this hard to chew. To say it was really Gummy would be an understatement. It stuck to your teeth when you ate it, was hard and beyond chewy. My kids had a really hard time eating them. It hurt their jaws. It got to the point where they weren't wanting them at all. I guess if you are needing to get your kids off the sugery stuff, you can just give them these since it will turn them off enough to never eat them again. No fun for anyone. I don't know if I just got a bad old batch or what, but this wasn't that great.
customer_reviews.author: marlee p.

customer_reviews.title: My kids' favorite fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: I think I made the mistake by ordering these in the summer. The USPS left the box at the curb in the heat. Thankfully Amazon sent me a notification saying my package was delivered. It sat in the full sun for a bit before getting the notification. The fruit snacks got extremely soft and a little mishapened. I immediately put the box in the fridge. They stayed there overnight. They were perfectly fine the next day. These are my kids' favorite fruit snacks! Order two...but maybe not during the summer. It's well into the 100 degree range here.
customer_reviews.author: Stdcam13

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: my 7 year old child he loves it and he loves to get snack before going to the daycare services while I am at work. he also goes through them like water so i have to hide them and only put out so many at a time. we love the different kind of flavors instead of one or two flavors...thank you....
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a rip off be warned....
customer_reviews.text: Out of the entire 110 packs there were exactly two of the mixed berry and 108 of the mixed fruit definitely a deceive package of snacks. It would have been better to not get them at all because the two only make the other 108 not taste as good since you now know what you're missing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Auclair

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Was so excited to buy Real Fruit snacks...I do house/dog sitting, day care etc at my clients homes & was looking forward to having easy, healthy snacks to bring along. I took few bites & they absolutely taste like chemicals. Really awful. That’s the Island Fruits “flavor”...& I live in Hawaii. I’ve had Welch’s fruit snacks before & loved them hence this order from Amazon. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Vikster

customer_reviews.title: Here's the thing...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst! It tastes so good so you HAVE to eat like 5 per sitting! This box barely lasted 5 days! If they just made it less tasty then I would not have this problem! Just absurd... Where do they get off putting so many tasty flavors together into each pack? A bunch of try hards if you ask me. Will I buy again? Probably... Have I gotten them every time I've gone to the store or ordered online? Yeah, maybe... But that's not the point! Worst product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are great for children the only thing is as an adult if it’s extremely hard to get a bag open For me, how are the school kid’s gonna get it open at lunch time, no scissors available, taste wise very good and each little bag has assorted flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Chichigirl

customer_reviews.title: Tasted great
customer_reviews.text: Love these fruit snacks, but didn’t love the way they arrived. Box came partially opened with some falling out. It wasn’t shipped in anything but the box, which would have been fine, had it not opened. Missing some:( but only option was to return for exchange and with COVID- too much of hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Shanae Binning

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and well packaged, They arrived quickly and were absolutely great to just stick in your pocket so when you’re out you could have a quick snack that was not messy. It’s easily in purse, pocket, change purse even. They did not get sticky in their little bags even one left in the heat of a car for several hours. No stickiness to the teeth! There is an excellent fresh fruit taste to each color. Excellent snack for kids and grandkids and adults. I highly recommend this and wish it came in bigger boxes with more packages!
customer_reviews.author: Raphaela

customer_reviews.title: Feel Like a Kid Again
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they came packaged in individually wrapped pouches that would keep the snacks fresh and would allow me the flexibility to stash a handful in my backpack for extra energy during day-long excursion on my upcoming cruise. One of several types of items that I bought for this purpose. What a surprise I had when I tasted a package. Made with real fruit juice, sure. Still looks like gummy candy, sure. BUT THE TASTE IS AWESOME!!! I ate 5 bags before I stopped myself. Buy these for yourself and hide them from the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nickapagano

customer_reviews.title: small packages, good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like these gummies. They are good quality and have a great flavor. They aren't exactly gourmet but what do you expect from a fruit snack. They are great for a quick no fuss snack. My only complaint, is the package size. For a 3-10 year old I am sure the size is just fine. For a young adult or adult its tiny. Either way it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids. YUM.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned three and her daycare kids eats these. Figured I’d stop being a stick in the mud and buy them for her. I opened one up to snack on one day, and now they’re hidden. She can have the next box. Super yummy! Would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: JJT

customer_reviews.title: Welch’s snack gummies
customer_reviews.text: My 23 month old grandson is a picky eater and doesn’t like a lot of foods, but he will eat these fruit snack gummies. These come in convenient packaging and a big box, but also in a smaller one. I keep on hand, because I know he will eat them. I feel good about him eating them, because there made with some juice Nice for on the go snack but there isn’t a lot in each package to be a filling snack, so I grab 2 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: *Angie*

customer_reviews.title: Something is definitely wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson’s because they used to love them. That is until this batch! I do not know what went horribly wrong with this batch but they aren’t edible! If my grandchildren refused to eat them you know there is definitely a problem! Had to throw the entire box out! Very unsatisfied customer! Oh, and they weren’t expired either!
customer_reviews.author: Sambolee

customer_reviews.title: Not only for kids. Attention: Diabetics!
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen with diabetes. My daughter is a school nurse. She has 6 diabetic children in her care. She told me she uses fruit snacks to help them out of a hypoglycemic state. She recommended that I keep them handy for the same reason. I keep 2 packs in my pocketbook, 2 in the car, 2 by my bed etc. They are a blessing. They hold up in a hot car and don’t go bad. Told my internist and she now recommends them to her patients.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were fruit bars
customer_reviews.text: These things aren't very good, at least to me. I can't give them away. Possibly I didn't read the description well enough? I don't think they are for adults, more for young kids maybe. The packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Balin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fruity snack, really good cold. Good price also. We order about every 5 wks
customer_reviews.text: We love these. My daughter got us started on these. But only the fruity ones. Great little individual packs. In summer I throw a handful of packs in fridge and boy they're a refreshing cool snack. Great packaging also. We put a bunch in our snack bowl, bunch in fridge and keep the box in pantry for needed refills. For 2 people it lasts about 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: CathyJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard & lacking flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago I ate these every day and loved them because they were soft & chewy and full of flavor. So I figured my 2-year-old would love them. However, when we got them, I tried them first. They are NEITHER soft NOR flavorful!! They were so hard...almost like eating a hard candy...and had very little flavor. These fruit snacks are nothing like they used to be!
customer_reviews.author: Teri S.

customer_reviews.title: How much is too much fruit snacks?
customer_reviews.text: This is great, so much cheaper than buying at the grocery stores. Really helps facilitate non-stop eating. Think I may have uncovered my addiction to fruit snacks. One box lasted me about a week, is that normal? I'm eating them right now and will probably eat more after that. I could probably finish the whole box right now. PLEASE HELP
customer_reviews.author: secondbushome

customer_reviews.title: Welches fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought a box of these for my nephews because I know they love them. They were eating and snacking on them every day and they really enjoy the flavors plus they’re great and easy for travel just like other small snack packs. I actually like the taste of them myself I’m curious about their other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Gumball Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Everything is Just right. Just right flavors, texture and chew. Taste is Fresh and reminds me of Welch's jellys when I was a kid. I told the Grandkids trying to keep a straigjt face "Grandma has to try them first. I need to make sure they arent disgusting flavors and make sure they are Not rock hard gummys". Before I finished saying that, they each had a pouch of gummys, smiling , and gave me thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Welch's mixed fruit 40 pouches per box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Welch's fruit rollup. There are 40 snack pouches to put in kids lunch box. They are individually wrapped and sealed for freshness. The flavors are mixed fruit and very tasty. It is a good value. The pouches are small and there are 13 pieces in each pouch. There are no preservatives and are gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: NOT a variety pack
customer_reviews.text: The snacks are good and fresh, just like expected. However, what didn't come as expected was the "variety" in this so called variety pack. Out of 110 packs in this box, 109 were mixed fruit and there was literally 1 of the berries n' cherries flavor. If I had wanted only the mixed fruit, that's what I would have ordered. Overall, they are a good and quick snack, and it's a nice amount for the price. I've been a fan of them for years. Just disappointed in the packing of this particular box. Hopefully future buyers will actually receive what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: This batch was awful
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this was a fluke or if they've changed how they make these, but the flavor is AWFUL and they've also caused a great deal of intestinal upset here. I have contacted the manufacturer w/ the UPC codes, and have let them know.
customer_reviews.author: darnyc

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are just as you'd expect- delicious and soft and chewy and in snack pack size. I love getting the subscribe and save discount on these making them even cheaper that they are in the stores. They are always fresh too. I hate when you get an old box of gummies and they are tough and tasteless- I have never had that issue with these.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: These Welch’s Mixed Fruit Snack Packs Are Fresh, Convenient and Economical!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had orthopedic surgery and needed to go to an inpatient Physical Therapy facility. These Welch’s Fruit Snacks were available in a vending machine at the usual high prices. I was very happy to find these at a much better price in snack sizes. These fruits are very fresh and convenient to toss in your purse, backpack or briefcase. I recommend these because in addition to convenience and freshness the price can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Snacks Galore
customer_reviews.text: Easter is this weekend and I thought I would get some fruit snacks because I love them so much. This 110 qty is the best because you don't have to go in the grocery store looking for stuff for Easter when you have Amazon. Now I can create my niece and nephews Easter baskets and have enough fruit snacks for myself! It's huge and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: HARD fruit snacks!
customer_reviews.text: The fruit snacks were HARD! I eat these all the time from the store and they’re normally soft & easy to chew! These are not. I don’t know if they’re past their expiration date or what the problem, but I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy this in Costco but since Costco is a 35 mins drive from me, it’s easier to just order them online. Always love this and I always have them in the pantry. Friends and their kids when they come and visit know that I have them and will just help themselves with it. The blackberry ones tho I find has always been harder than the rest. No biggie. Still tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: Half stale / Half Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Welches fruit snacks are super addicting and usually delicious but these are half stale. I open the little pouch and half fresh & half stale everytime. It's so weird. I get welches berries & cherries every 2 weeks & they are always super fresh. I would love a fresh box but until then I'll continue getting Cherries & berries.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: NOT A VARIETY PACK
customer_reviews.text: I opened this and I kid you not there was 109 pouches of berries n cherries and 1 pouch of mixed fruit. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: xX_Neo_Xx

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: My mother needed a new treat- She resides in an assisted care- Foods are often bland- I decided from shared views to test these- I sprinkled a few on a cup of pudding- She was delighted- A tad tart but nice fruity flavor- generous amount in each individual packet- Now she likes them as a easy to open, just enough to satisfy for a snack and to share with her friends--& Budget friendly-
customer_reviews.author: GrannyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Perfect for Snacking
customer_reviews.text: I am always a little worried about ordering shelf stable food on Amazon. I hate not knowing the expiration date especially on bulk things like this. But these came with a long expiration date! They were also fresh and packaged well. They are a perfect healthier snack to take with you or to enjoy at home (at least better than cupcakes!).
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Stale and too hard for my toddlers to safely eat
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these at our local grocery store.. They're usually the best gummies, soft and taste great, but this whole pack is totally stale. They have not expired. They're hard and tasteless, super disappointing! I cannot give these to my kiddos as I'm afraid they'll choke. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlers any age!
customer_reviews.text: I've never purchased these in store. Usually buy the Walmart smiley face ones.. but these are so much better!! The consistency is something I can give my 1yo as well as my older children so he no longer feels left out. They have great flavor and it is quantity AND quality for price. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: For me they just don't taste as good as the Black Forest brand. They aren't as flavorful with the rich fruity flavor. I had to guess a lot on which flavor I was eating. With Black Forest brand there is no doubt what each flavor is and they taste closer to the real fruit. Yummy snack.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful and Sweet Juice Gummies
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting and convenient snacks. My wife always takes a packet to lunch and she always has friends suddenly. They re flavorful and sweet. Have real fruit juice flavors with a little vitamin C too. Nice small treat or pick me up to snack on.
customer_reviews.author: RoyBoy1

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Addicting
customer_reviews.text: From the first time I tried these fruit chews, I've been addicted. My daughters and I love the flavors and consistency. We order at least one box a month and sometimes more. We only buy Welch's fruit chews because the other brands just are not anywhere near as tasty.
customer_reviews.author: L. Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, but flavor balance very variable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of these. The fruit flavor has a brightness that is generally in tune with its intended representation. No funky or excessively lingering after-taste. My biggest issue is the lack balance between packets and that some packets may not have any grape or lemon, others no orange.
customer_reviews.author: CognitiveIndi

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY,YUMMY and soooo good for  you 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.text: You know I am so busy and so tired after a hard day of gardening BUT I just had to tell anyone who is thinking about purchasing this product; GO AHEAD AND JUMP RIGHT IN. This snack is nutritional, delicious, satisfying to the sweet tooth but beware they are addictive! Your children ,at ay age will enjoy the sweet fruity taste. Come on, you will love them
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Olinger

customer_reviews.title: Convenient delivery every month
customer_reviews.text: We like the flavor and it is a quick "sugar fix" snack. One package is often not quite enough for an adult. May consider them for candy give-away days. No regrets for purchase and will continue to get them through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AND A LARGER QUANTITY
customer_reviews.text: Was very good. The 40 counts sometime have a flavor difference but these were all great. Sad they doubled the price on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: NOT FRESH AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: BACK IN APRIL 2019 I ORDERED THREE BOXES ON THESE FRUIT SNACKS AND TWO OF THE BOXES WERE FRESH AND ONE WAS BORDER LINE FRESH. SO I TOOK A CHANCE AND ORDER ONE BOX RECENTLY TO BUT IN KIDS PARTY BAGS. BAD, BAD, BAD CHOICE. THE FRUIT FLAVORS WERE NOT FRESH AND THE GRAPE FRUITS WERE HARD. WASTED MONEY AND EMBARRASSED.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: The Best Fruit Snack Ever...
customer_reviews.text: Welch's fruit is the ONLY one my picky toddler will eat. I've bought so many different kinds - most are hard and lack flavor. Not these, this is our third box. It's a great snack and easy on the go and she loves them. Thank you Welch's.
customer_reviews.author: P.Sanders

customer_reviews.title: The fruit drops are much better than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product is delicious. Whenever I desire a snack, rather than go for candy or cookies I select one or two bags of Welch's Fruit Snack, relax and totally enjoy my break. I keep these handy for snacks for children knowing I have given a healthy treat besides I love hearing the laughter and "I got a red or yellow one - what color is yours?"
customer_reviews.author: phyllis j. sirola

customer_reviews.title: If you like Welches Fruit Bites, the grape flavored ones are the best!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have a problem with these...we are addicted. I love these, especially the grape ones. One hint, put these fruit bites in the freezer before eatin...they are awesome this way! But be careful, you might become addicted as well!
customer_reviews.author: DeniseG

customer_reviews.title: Must have for two year olds
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these things. He eats like 10 packs a day and he’s two. Don’t know if that’s the best diet for him but he can’t get enough. And when he doesn’t eat these he wants popsicles so these are healthier than that.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieTop Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: Best fruit snack!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite fruit snack for a long time. So after the pandemic hit and I couldn’t get it on the groceries store, I went to Amazon and yes!!!! I absolutely love the flavor, texture, colors. There’s a couple different flavors and they all are good!
customer_reviews.author: VWGUY

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting, Universally Loved Snacks
customer_reviews.text: I love eating these things. The 80 count box is great as the packages are small so you can control how many you eat (if you feel like it). I leave them out at work and people always ask for a pack when they pass by. I've never had an issue with freshness after over a dozen boxes this year.
customer_reviews.author: monkeychef

customer_reviews.title: Great juicy flavor
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids LOVE these gummy snacks. I’ve purchased these a few times now and this time they are gonna go in my little ones stockings. Always so fresh and the flavors are so yummy and juicy. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gigi2three

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: For fruit snacks made with real fruit juice you'd expect these to be bursting with flavor, but unfortunately they aren't. I've had these for a while and even the kids haven't eaten them, so that's really saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Diverse Shopper✌️

customer_reviews.title: Not like a gummy bear.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They aren't like gummy bears they're a different texture. Not like something you have have to chew, you can actually bite them in half. If you like that kind you know what I'm saying.
customer_reviews.author: keyna krantz

customer_reviews.title: Favorite fruit snack
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely my favorite fruit snacks: the kids love taken. This may sound weird, but for some reason, the grape fruit snacks are always tougher and harder to chew Lol that’s their only flaw
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: great flavors
customer_reviews.text: These fruit snacks are great berry flavors and yes best of all do not stick in/on my teeth
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good as snack
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the Welch snack , we have been buying it for a long time , everything was great but this time some of the packages were not sealed and some of them were out of the flavor, but I have check the expiration date, it is expire next year ... will try another purchase to see if this happens again ...
customer_reviews.author: John Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: GMO genetically modified with glyphosate (carcinogen).
customer_reviews.text: High fructose corn syrup. Need I say more? I don't feed my family GMO. 90 percent of Corn and soy products grown in the US. is genetically modified organisms with glyphosate (a carcinogen in the DNA). If I wanted to feed the insurance and pharmaceutical companies my money, I'd continue to buy non organic foods. I'm definitely not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Acosta-Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these as potty snacks! I love the grape ones and the peach ones. Some of the red ones aren’t that great to me. I use them to reward my son for peeing in the potty. They work well for that purpose. They’re so affordable on subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.author: Careroll Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Fruit snacks that rock!
customer_reviews.text: Love getting these for snacks for the kids when we’re out and about. They come in cute little bags and super easy to open. My kid’s love them! Also love that I can get a huge box for such a great deal Compared to the ones in grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: Ehab TRAISH

customer_reviews.title: Del Bosqueicious and I will buy more!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and I enjoyed every one of them. I love fruit and this made my cravings satisfied. Thank You Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Idgi

customer_reviews.title: Super tasty and great for nephew and niece
customer_reviews.text: These are good tasting, and are the perfect size for a snack for our nephew and niece. The box has a lot of them in it, and so it takes a couple of months to go through them. Even the ones on the bottom still taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Loving the Columbia Gorge

customer_reviews.title: Like Candy - not healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Individually wrapped gummies - some were very good, but others were stale, and some had a bitter after taste. I definitely don't like the corn syrup as a sweetener in something advertised as healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, avoid ordering in summer
customer_reviews.text: Great deal especially with subscribe and save... Do not order if you live anywhere warm, they will arrive melted. Seems like a given but unfortunately I didn't consider a heatwave coming or how long they'd sit on the truck
customer_reviews.author: Emma. H

customer_reviews.title: berries and cherries are sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: My family has enjoyed Welch’s fruit snacks-mixed fruit flavor for years. When I found this mixed pack with Berries and Cherries, we were looking forward to trying that. Turns out this flavor is wet inside the packet, which is very sticky. Also they are softer, gooey like texture, which is why I am writing this review. Must be made and packaged in 2 different methods. Suggest they discontinue the Berries and Cherries.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

product_meta.title: Welch's Fruit Snacks, Mixed Fruit, Gluten Free, Bulk Pack, 0.9 oz Individual Single Serve Bags (Pack of 40)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Mixed Fruit| Size:0.9 Ounce (Pack of 40)Welch's Fruit Snacks Mixed Fruit. Family farmer owned.80 Calorie pouches. Fruit is our 1st ingredient. Natural & artificial flavors. Made with real fruit. DV per serving: 100% Vitamin C. 25% Vitamins A & E. Fat free. Gluten free. No preservatives.
feature_bullets: Delicious fruit snacks where fruit is the 1st Ingredient
Delicious fruit snacks where fruit is the 1st Ingredient
Gluten free, fat free & preservative free
Perfect tasty snack for school lunches, sporting games, the office and more

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
